house_listing.house_description: The barton creek. Versatile plan. Master bedrm down, 2nd or study with bath on 1st floor. Crawl foundation. Brick front, jetted tub, crown moulding & tray ceilings, 9 ft ceilings. Under construction with 1st delivery march 2000. Can arrange to see an occupied home.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Office, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
